# About Me

I am a PhD candidate at the [Chair for Personnel Economics](https://cd.wiso.uni-koeln.de/de/team/personalwirtschaftslehre) at the University of Cologne and a member of [C-SEB](https://c-seb.de/).

My resesarch covers topics in personnel economics and managerial accounting. I am particularly interested the management of employee skills. I cooperate extensively with public and private organizations where I conduct field experiments, longitudinal survey and analyze performance data.

You can find me current CV [here](https://drive.google.com/file/d/1sQoj0FTfBsFI8CJNOIkBvMQYXdSD1UlC/view?usp=sharing)

My email is: [grabe\[at\]wiso.uni-koeln.de]{.underline}
